title: i really really enjoy playing league of legends :)
body: this game really tickles my fancy :) .

replies.body:
I have to agree with you there friend! League is by far, one, no THE best game I have ever played! Just thinking about getting hot and sweaty in a ranked game makes me blush! When my pop died, I sat down and played some LoL, rather than dealing with his funeral.

10/10 would play for the next 5 years.

i would play this game for the rest of my life.  because this game helps me succeed. i learn how to work with others which will in turn allow me to get along well with real life colleagues and the stress management involved in this game is absolutely vital for life success!
You learn how to cry and block people. They aren't life lessons friend. You can't just block people irl when they make you cry guy. :^)
I approve of this message, LoL is definitely one of the most fun and least stressful games around. I don't know what I'd do without it being here to brighten up my day.

i am really glad that you agree. honestly when I'm feeling down or just upset in life. i come to league of legends to take my stress away. you are 100% correct, what would i do with out this marvellous video game
I hope u realise he was being sarcastic.

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=752ERxXy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T10:21:07.179+0000)
>
> I hope u realise he was being sarcastic.

I assure you sir neither of us are being sarcastic we both love this game with all our hearts
it is better than anything in this world. i would rather 5 games of league than participate in any proven methods of relaxation. ty

thanks for agreeing with me that league of legends is the greatest video game ever made, it just makes you so warm on the  inside and every time i play i just want to leap into a warm spring day frolicking in the meadows somewhere in france and sing tralalalalala with betsy
so you wouldn't like to jump into a warm spa with some hot milf, drinking a few glasses of white wine and eating cherries, then sucking/licking on her cleavage and then doing her, all in the spa?

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=752ERxXy,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-01-06T16:08:46.406+0000)
>
> so you wouldn't like to jump into a warm spa with some hot milf, drinking a few glasses of white wine and eating cherries, then sucking/licking on her cleavage and then doing her, all in the spa?

That sounds stressful to me. Imagine how annoying it would be, having to ignore some of your favourite sexual positions so that neither of you drown or get mouthfuls of water. Like, gosh.
Also, I hate cherries.
%%%%.
Cherries.
Just thinking about cherries heightens my anxiety!
that sounds like a lot of work. league of legends is very easy thus it is a fun game and a relaxing game for everyone of all ages!  keeping it real for all ages!
